page.title: 14LAMPLUGH YOUNG FARMERS
page.content: Lamplugh Young Farmers Club draws its members from, Ennerdale, Dean, Lamplugh, Ullock and Branthwaite. You need to be between the ages of 13 and 26 to join. Meetings are held in different places. The Young Farmers is a Nationwide club. Their main event is the Annual Field day held in May. There are many events, showes and competitions. The sorts of jobs that they do are mainly farming, but some haven't started work yet. They don't have regular meetings and when an event is coming up they have more to talk about at the meetings. At the meetings they have talks and films and small slide shows. They enjoy themselves at meetings. The events are the Annual Field day, Competetions, Quizes, Soil Assesments, Dress Making and half hour plays.
